item.title: Report X-2024010260
item.description:
Report X-2024010260

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-17T15:11:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-21
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND DURING A DOCK WALK. IT WAS NOTED THAT THE PACKAGE HAD CORROSIVE DIAMONDS ON IT AND THAT IT HAD BEEN LEAKING. THE ADMIN PLACED THE PACKAGE INTO A LINED TOTE AND BROUGHT IT TO THE HAZ CAGE FOR INSPECTION. DescribePack: THERE IS AN UNKNOWN LEAK COMING FROM THE BOTTOM OF THE PLASTIC CONTAINER. THE CONTAINER WAS PACKED INSIDE A PLASTIC BAG WHICH HAD MOST OF THE LIQUID TRAPPED INSIDE BUT IT STARTED TO EAT THROUGH THE BAG ALLOWING THE LIQUID TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: EVERYTHING WAS PLACED INTO A LINED DRUM FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report E-2024010109
item.description:
Report E-2024010109

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-16T18:13:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-07
  • City: SAINT LOUIS
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 2.5 gallons of NU-BRITE® Ultra Concentrate Coil Cleaner (UN3266) was released from a 2.5-gallon plastic jug due to improper packing by the SHIPPER. The release impacted the concrete at dock door 12. No storm drains or waterways are reported to be impacted by the release. The contractor neutralized the material with a soda ash and water solution due to its incompatibility with acids, (1) 30-gallon DF containing 1 2.5-gallon plastic jug of NU-BRITE® Ultra Concentrate Coil Cleaner, (1) 55-gallon DF containing 4 boxes of UV Leak Detection Kits impacted by neutralized NU-BRITE® Ultra Concentrate Coil Cleaner, (1) 55-gallon DF containing 2 boxes an 4 20oz metal cans of Rx11-Flush impacted by neutralized NU-BRITE® Ultra Concentrate Coil Cleaner, (1) 55-gallon DF containing spill pads, cardboard, and pallet pieces impacted neutralized NU-BRITE® Ultra Concentrate Coil Cleaner were collected as waste and left onsite for the terminal to manage by HEPACO for the terminal to manage.
